scripts.predev: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('.dev', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.mkdirSync('.dev', { recursive: true }); fs.cpSync('public', '.dev', { recursive: true }); let c = fs.readFileSync('index.html', 'utf-8').replace('src=\"/index.tsx\"', 'src=\"./bundle.js\"'); fs.writeFileSync('.dev/index.html', c);"
scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.mkdirSync('dist', { recursive: true }); fs.cpSync('public', 'dist', { recursive: true }); let c = fs.readFileSync('index.html', 'utf-8').replace('src=\"/index.tsx\"', 'src=\"./bundle.js\"'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/index.html', c);" && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --minify --sourcemap --jsx=automatic --external:@google/genai --format=esm
